# Karabiner-shortcut-sleep
Change _Application_ to dual keys, _Launchpad_ and _Eject_.

### Description
Change _Application_ key to _Eject_ if pressed with other keys, open _Launchpad_ if pressed alone. You can click _Command_ + _Option_ + _Application_ to Sleep your Mac now.

### Instalation
- Visit URL: https://genesy.github.io/karabiner-complex-rules-generator/#

- Click ***Install!***. 

- Then You should be transferred to **_Karabiner-Elements_** to add **_Complex Modification_**.
